parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
The Sorting direction. Values:
* **DESC**: Descending (if not specified, the default is descending order)
* **ASC**: Ascending

parameters.name: DomainType
parameters.description:
The type of the domain name. Valid values:

*   PUBLIC (default): hosted public domain name
*   CACHE: cached public domain name

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh** : Chinese
*   **en** (default) : English

parameters.name: OrderBy
parameters.description:
The Sorting parameter. Values:
* createDate: Sort by creation time (if not specified, the default is to sort by creation time)
* expireDate: Sort by expiration time

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: UserClientIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the client.

parameters.name: VersionCode
parameters.description: The version code of the Alibaba Cloud DNS instance.
